experience.description: Manager of Abhyuday, social festival of IIT Bombay which aims at bridging the gap between youth and social issues.Leading a 2-tier team of 100 organizers to manage social clubs and initiatives and organize the annual social festival of IIT Bombay.Abhyuday is 2-day social festival started with a vision to foster leadership and drive to bring about social change among the youth.Forging partnerships with leading media companies to ensure a pan-India coverage of Abhyuday.
